body.$description: Main page background for dark mode

surface.$description: Card and panel background for dark mode

primary.$description: Primary text color in dark mode (high contrast)

secondary.$description: Secondary/metadata text color in dark mode

muted.$description: Muted/disabled text color in dark mode

inverse.$description: Inverse text color for dark mode (dark on light elements)

default.$description: Standard border color for dark mode

muted.$description: Subtle border color for dark mode
